ARTICLE.TITLE: Gujarat: Man puts chilli powder on wife’s private parts for refusing to make tea
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Woman thrashed by husband in Ahmedabad [Representative image] | Photo Credit: iStock Images

Key Highlights A heated argument broke out between the woman and her mother-in-law after she refused to make tea The woman's mother-in-law allegedly gave a stick to her husband for thrashing her

Ahmedabad: A 23-year-old woman from Ahmedabad has lodged a complaint against her husband, accusing him of thrashing her with a stick and putting chilli powder on her private parts after she refused to make tea for his mother on Monday.

Sheetala Satam was observed by Hindus on Monday. Devotees do not use fire in the kitchen on this day. Therefore, the food is prepared on the previous day of Sashti. The complainant, a resident of the city’s Sabarmati area, told the police that she was asked to make tea by her mother-in-law. She refused it, saying that it was Sheetala Satam, therefore, she cannot use the stove. A heated argument broke out between the woman and her mother-in-law, in front of her husband, who then thrashed her.

Mother-in-law gives stick to woman's husband

Later, the complainant left the house and headed to a tea stall in the vicinity of their house. Her husband and mother-in-law followed her. They allegedly dragged her to the house after hitting her with a stone. The mother-in-law then gave a stick to the woman’s husband, who then brutally thrashed her with it after putting chilli powder on her private parts, according to a report by Ahmedabad Mirror.

The complainant said that her husband and mother-in-law have been torturing and harassing her since the birth of her son. Several times in the past, she had left her matrimonial house to live with her parents but came back every time.

Another incident

In another incident, a 40-year-old man allegedly slit his 35-year-old wife's throat after an argument over less sugar in tea in Lakhimpur Kheri district of Uttar Pradesh in June. The couple's children were sleeping. They got up on hearing their father's screams. As they rushed to the kitchen, they noticed their mother lying in a pool of blood and gasping for breath.
